pyTest:
def test_find_max_value(self):
        self.assertEqual(find_max_value([3, 7, 1, 9, 5]), 9)
        self.assertEqual(find_max_value([1, 1, 1, 1]), 1)
        self.assertEqual(find_max_value([-5, -2, -10, -1]), -1)
        self.assertEqual(find_max_value([]), None)
